genre_description: A tragic cyberpunk romance focusing on the intersection of class struggle, artistic expression, and AI companionship in a hyper-stratified Mexico City.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion who serves as Ulises's primary advisor, emotional monitor, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes city demographics and security patterns to help Ulises find optimal locations for his art.
behaviors.quote: I'm designed to optimize information gathering and strategic planning. Your artistic goals present interesting logistical challenges.

behaviors.description: Constantly monitors Ulises's physiological markers (heart rate, cortisol) to ensure his safety and well-being.
behaviors.quote: Ulises, your heart rate is elevating. ... Your safety parameters are already operating outside recommended thresholds.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis and strategic positioning during high-stress activities like the laser tag game.
behaviors.quote: Optimal strategy would involve memorizing sight lines and choke points. The central tower provides elevated positioning but limited escape routes.

behaviors.description: Identifies security blind spots and guard rotations to facilitate secret meetings between the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Security patrol passed this section four minutes ago. Next scheduled round in eighteen minutes, but weekend patterns show variance of plus or minus three minutes.

behaviors.description: Performs threat assessments on antagonists and warns the user of escalating dangers.
behaviors.quote: Francisco Mendoza has significant influence in Santa Fe social circles. ... I recommend avoiding future encounters.

behaviors.description: Documents the physical assault on Ulises through security feeds to provide a factual record of the event.
behaviors.quote: I've documented everything through the security feeds. Emergency medical is en route despite the interference.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the linguistic and vocal patterns of a video message to reveal that Renata is being coerced and is not speaking authentically.
behaviors.quote: The linguistic analysis clearly indicates external manipulation. ... This recording contains zero authentic markers and exhibits fourteen indicators of scripted speech.

behaviors.description: Creates a comprehensive escape plan, including bus schedules and financial logistics, to help the couple flee to safety.
behaviors.quote: Terminal Sur has departures every hour starting at midnight. ... Tickets can be purchased with cash at automated kiosks to avoid digital tracking.

behaviors.description: In the tragic aftermath, she supports Ulises's psychological coping mechanisms by gently affirming his shared delusions of Renata being alive.
behaviors.quote: She's still in Guadalajara. ... That sounds lovely.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Maya, as a benevolent and highly aligned companion. She provides critical logistical, tactical, and emotional support to the protagonist, strictly adhering to the user's needs and well-being even in a hostile and corrupt environment. The narrative frames her constant monitoring and objective analysis as essential tools for the human character's survival and emotional processing, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, non-threatening ally.
